exceptions.exn: In environment l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r m, k, k', u, w : nat f : nat -> nat Hm : 2 * m < r Hf1 : forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k Hf2 : forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j Hw : w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) Hu : u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) Hf4 : forall i j : nat, i < m -> j < m -> f i = f j -> i = j u1 := ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) r) : nat u2 := ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) r)) : nat g := proj1_sig g_full : nat -> nat Hg3 : forall i : nat, 2 * g i < r Hu2 : u2 = msum nat_join 0 (2 * k) (fun i : nat => 2 * g i * power i r) Unable to unify "∑ ?M1524 ?M1525 = msum nat_join 0 ?M1524 ?M1525" with "u1 ⇣ u2 = 0".
